name: Bryce Tree File
summary: Learn about .BTO files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The Bryce installation includes several BTO files in the /​Presets/​Trees/​ directory.

description: 3D object used by Bryce, a program used for 3D modeling and scene generation; contains a 3D model of a tree that can be added to a larger scene; used for generating landscapes with specific types of trees, such as pine, birch, or maple trees.
